ACTIVITY.description: Manual ingestion of Turnstile Low Level Requirements
ACTIVITY.title: TurnstileIngestion-Low Level Requirements

turnstile_LowLevelRequirement.description: Executive shall spawn Input Thread on powerup
turnstile_LowLevelRequirement.title: Low Level Requirement

turnstile_LowLevelRequirement.description: Executive shall spawn Output Thread on powerup
turnstile_LowLevelRequirement.title: Low Level Requirement

turnstile_LowLevelRequirement.description: Executive shall print a single '.' character to the console every second when running
turnstile_LowLevelRequirement.title: Low Level Requirement

turnstile_LowLevelRequirement.description: Input Thread shall initialize the park_count to 0 on powerup
turnstile_LowLevelRequirement.title: Low Level Requirement

turnstile_LowLevelRequirement.description: Input Thread shall check for a incoming UDP message on port 62000
turnstile_LowLevelRequirement.title: Low Level Requirement

turnstile_LowLevelRequirement.description: Input Thread shall check for a incoming UDP message on port 62000
turnstile_LowLevelRequirement.title: Low Level Requirement

turnstile_LowLevelRequirement.description: Input Thread shall add the delta value received by the UDP to the park_count and send the updated park_count to the Output Thread when a valid UDP message is received and the park_count range is not exceed
turnstile_LowLevelRequirement.title: Low Level Requirement

turnstile_LowLevelRequirement.description: Input Thread shall add the delta value received by the UDP to the park_count and send the updated park_count to the Output Thread when a valid UDP message is received and the park_count range is not exceed
turnstile_LowLevelRequirement.title: Low Level Requirement

turnstile_LowLevelRequirement.description: Input Thread shall limit park_count to between 0 and 1500
turnstile_LowLevelRequirement.title: Low Level Requirement

turnstile_LowLevelRequirement.description: Input Thread shall print 'Invalid Message' to the console when a invalid UDP message is received
turnstile_LowLevelRequirement.title: Low Level Requirement

turnstile_LowLevelRequirement.description: Input Thread shall print 'Limit Exceeded'' to the console when a valid UDP message is received and the park_count range is exceed
turnstile_LowLevelRequirement.title: Low Level Requirement

turnstile_LowLevelRequirement.description: Output Thread shall initialize the park_count to 0 on powerup
turnstile_LowLevelRequirement.title: Low Level Requirement

turnstile_LowLevelRequirement.description: Output Thread shall broadcast a UDP message on port 62001 with the park_count every second
turnstile_LowLevelRequirement.title: Low Level Requirement
